name: expo-stores-app
description: Root script to manage build and deployment for Expo Stores

scripts.build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.check:cycles: madge --circular --extensions js,jsx,ts,tsx client/src && madge --circular --extensions js,jsx,ts,tsx server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build:prod: npm ci --omit=dev && cd client && npm ci --omit=dev && npm run build
